title: Create a stacked bar chart over time
description: To build stacked bar charts, structure the query to output a time bucket plus a categorical series field. Use timechart() or groupBy() + timechart() and then select a stacked bar visualization in the UI.

examples.name: Example
examples.description: Buckets detections by day and series on DetectName so the UI can display stacked bars representing different detection names per day.
